title: Updating
content:
To update or use an old version of Unsloth, follow the steps below: ## Standard Updating (recommended): ### Updating without dependency updates: 
pip install --upgrade --force-reinstall --no-cache-dir --no-deps unsloth
pip install --upgrade --force-reinstall --no-cache-dir --no-deps unsloth_zoo
## To use an old version of Unsloth: {% code overflow="wrap" %} '2025.1.5' is one of the previous old versions of Unsloth. Change it to a specific release listed on our [Github here](https://github.com/unslothai/unsloth/releases).
